DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":24,"WidgetYPosition":15,"WidgetRows":9,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
	select	ucdd.Company as Companies,
			ucdd.Division as Divisions,
			ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select 
    v.[Name] as [User], 
    v.CreatedBy as UserId, 
    v.Day, 
    v.[HasImage], 
    sum(v.Done) as Done, 
    sum(v.ToDo) as ToDo
from (
select d.CreatedBy, u.[Name], u.[HasImage],
		case 
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate ) < @FromDate then 0
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = @FromDate then 1
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = DATEADD(day, 1, @FromDate) then 2
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = DATEADD(day, 2, @FromDate) then 3
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = DATEADD(day, 3, @FromDate) then 4
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = DATEADD(day, 4, @FromDate) then 5
		end as Day,
		sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)) as ToDo,
		sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [Event] e
on d.[Oid] = e.[Oid]
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
full join [User] u
on u.[Oid] = d.[CreatedBy]
where e.[GCRecord] is null and d.CreatedBy is not null and 
		(u.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(u.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(u.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		and u.Company = cup.Companies
		and u.Division = cup.Divisions
		and u.Department = cup.Departments
group by d.CreatedBy, d.AgreedDate, u.[Name], u.[HasImage]
) as v
group by v.CreatedBy, v.Day, v.[Name], v.[HasImage]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","startDate","endDate"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":30,"WidgetYPosition":24,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":6,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
	select	ucdd.Company as Companies,
			ucdd.Division as Divisions,
			ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as FridayToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as FridayDone
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = DATEADD(day, 4, @FromDate)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
        and d.Company = cup.Companies
		and d.Division = cup.Divisions
		and d.Department = cup.Departments","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":24,"WidgetYPosition":6,"WidgetRows":9,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
	select	ucdd.Company as Companies,
			ucdd.Division as Divisions,
			ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select v.[Name] as Client, v.Client as ClientId, v.Day, v.[HasImage], sum(v.Done) as Done, sum(v.ToDo) as ToDo
from (
select d.Client, cc.[Name], cc.[HasImage],
		case 
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate ) < @FromDate then 0
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = @FromDate then 1
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = DATEADD(day, 1, @FromDate) then 2
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = DATEADD(day, 2, @FromDate) then 3
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = DATEADD(day, 3, @FromDate) then 4
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = DATEADD(day, 4, @FromDate) then 5
		end as Day,
		sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)) as ToDo,
		sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [Event] e
on d.[Oid] = e.[Oid]
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
full join [CommercialClient] cc
on cc.[Oid] = d.[Client]
where e.[GCRecord] is null and d.Client is not null and 
		(d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
        and d.Company = cup.Companies
		and d.Division = cup.Divisions
		and d.Department = cup.Departments
group by d.Client, d.AgreedDate, cc.[Name], cc.[HasImage]
) as v
group by v.Client, v.Day, v.[Name], v.[HasImage]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":24,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":6,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
	select	
		ucdd.Company as Companies,
		ucdd.Division as Divisions,
		ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	
		SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	
		ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select 
	IsNull(count(d.Client), 0) as countLate
from 
	CurrentUserPermissions cup, 
	Deliverable d
		left outer join [WorkflowState] ws on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
		left outer join [WorkflowStateType] wst on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where 
	Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) < @FromDate 
    and (wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5)
	and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
	(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
	(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	and d.Company = cup.Companies
	and d.Division = cup.Divisions
	and d.Department = cup.Departments","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","startDate","endDate"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Filters

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":6,"WidgetYPosition":24,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":6,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
	select	ucdd.Company as Companies,
			ucdd.Division as Divisions,
			ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MondayToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MondayDone
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = @FromDate
        and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
        and d.Company = cup.Companies
		and d.Division = cup.Divisions
		and d.Department = cup.Departments","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Last 10 Weeks
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters: [{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#e0e0e0","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":2,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-19, 0) as Week\r\nunion all\r\nselect DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+1, 0) as Week","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration: {"stateStoring":{"enabled":false},"height":"485","searchPanel":{"visible":false},"columnChooser":{"enabled":false},"onToolbarPreparing":"null","export":{"enabled":false},"groupPanel":{"visible":false},"grouping":{"autoExpandAll":false},"selection":{"mode":"none"},"sorting":{"mode":"none"},"allowColumnReordering":false,"rowAlternationEnabled":false,"showBorders":false,"columns":[{"dataField":"ClientId","caption":"","cellTemplate":"function(e, i) { SK.showImage(e, 'client', 'medium',i.data['ClientHasImage'], i.data['Client'], i.data['ClientId']) }","width":50},{"dataField":"Project","name":"Project","caption":"Project","width":150},{"dataField":"UserId","caption":"","cellTemplate":"function(e, i) { SK.showImage(e, 'user', 'small',i.data['UserHasImage'], i.data['User'], i.data['UserId']) }","width":30},{"dataField":"User","name":"Name","caption":"Executor","width":150},{"dataField":"Name","name":"Name","caption":"Job","width":"100%"},{"dataField":"Date","caption":"Date","dataType":"date","format":"d MMM","cellTemplate":"function(e, i) {                var showDate = i.text;                if (i.data.Day == 0) {                    SW.setAttribute(e, showDate, 'style', 'background-color:rgb(247,                65,                45); color: white; border-radius: 4px; width: 60px; line-height: 25px; font-weight: 600')            } else {                    SW.setAttribute(e, showDate, 'style', 'background-color:#0072C6; color: white; border-radius: 4px; width: 60px; line-height: 25px; font-weight: 600')            }        }","alignment":"center","width":70}],"onContentReady":"function ola(e) {debugger;}"}

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":24,"WidgetYPosition":24,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":6,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
	select	ucdd.Company as Companies,
			ucdd.Division as Divisions,
			ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ThursdayToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ThursdayDone
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = DATEADD(day, 3, @FromDate)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":12,"WidgetYPosition":24,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":6,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
	select	ucdd.Company as Companies,
			ucdd.Division as Divisions,
			ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as TuesdayToDo,

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":18,"WidgetYPosition":24,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":6,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
	select	ucdd.Company as Companies,
			ucdd.Division as Divisions,
			ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as WednesdayToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as WednesdayDone
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = DATEADD(day, 2, @FromDate)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
